attributes.review: i thought to myself who doesn’t want a misogynistic racist rapist for a president so i downloaded this app. turns out it’s owned by the chinese government!!!! they hacked my account and sent spies to my home. they said, “ew you’re a trump supporter someone with half a brain would know he’s an awful person” so they then kidnapped me and took me to paris where we got croissants then i saw Donald trump himself walk up. “give me back my supporter i need as many as i can because everyone hates me” he said but as soon as i saw him the bright complexion of his shiny orange skin caused me to have a seizure. i would not recommend this app.
attributes.title: HORRIFYING 🤢🤢🤢

attributes.review: first off i would like to say this app took exactly 7 full days to download! i was also shocked to see a a horrifying picture of a gigantic, fat, and ugly cheeto puff!!! i had to rinse out my eyes after looking at it🤢!!! and may i say i have never encountered an app like this one. anyways once the app was finally downloaded on my phone a man decked out in trump merchandise jumped out of my phone😨😨😨!!!!! he proceeded to put a “make america great again” hat on my dog. i did not appreciate this as my dog has a severely sensitive scalp!!! he then picked up my dog and ran outside with dog in hand. fortunately my dog was able to get away. as i was trying to comprehend what had just happened this mystery man vanished in thin air🤭😦!!! all i was trying to do was support our oh so great orange🍊🧡🟠 president and now i don’t think i can. i was so excited to see that there was a trump2020 app but now i am just disappointed.
attributes.title: this app stole my dog!!!😖😱😰

attributes.review: I open the app to see multiple pictures of a man doing inappropriate gestures. I was texted and called nonstop because my phone number had been sold to telemarketers off of this app (I don’t put my phone number in any other app or account). I was extremely disappointed with this app, especially because multiple grown men had messaged me and said very raunchy things to me. I’m just concerned for the children who wish to download this app. I recommend this app be taken down from the App Store, it is extremely offensive and I really regret my decision of downloading it.
attributes.title: very offensive

attributes.title: Literally Anyone Else 2020

attributes.review: absolutely not❤️ i really don’t like this app it’s really yucky n makes me throw up when i open it😡 i almost died TEN times from going on this app! i am very mad n dissatisfied! Have🤔you😒ever😔been😡snaked🐍by🙃a🤨 friend👧then😪just😾for 🤦the🗣️clout👀they'll😈do😣it😕again🙄 very mad me no like this app VERY VERY BAD APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD WILL GIVE U HEAD ACHES N WILL MAKE U ALMOST DIE. it also gave me 100 viruses on my phone😡😭 bye i really do not like this. trump supporters, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP NO TRUMP2020!!! very bad he has no lips how will he get a kiss kiss very ugly! no kiss for him hahahahah i🥵climbed🧭out🥫of👋my🔒head🤯and⛸watched⏰myself👈implode💥a👅thought💭without ❌a⚠️body💤 oughta🎤be🐝the🏎 shot🔫

I tried to download this app for over a month now, and it struggles to load, but when it does, it continually lies about some of the things trump is doing, like he made the economy better after Obama screwed it up, and that is simply not true, Bush gave Obama a failing economy before he started, and even that didn’t hinder Obama because he improved the unemployment rate to all time lows after the recession of 2008 and now people believe only Donald Trump did it, and look where we are now, brink of chaos and Marshall Law being displayed. “A government afraid of its people isn’t a government at all.”
attributes.title: Terrible app to use.

attributes.review: I gave this app a 1 star rating💯 because it is sooo badly made! It made me gag. 🤮Because it took so long to load and not to mention I hated seeing a Orange Cheeto Puff🍊🍊🍊 On The Screen all the time🤡. It was so bad that I had to put my phone in a blender! If you are going to get this app, afterwards you would want to bleach your eyeballs out and you would see this in your nightmares😭! This app made my dog cry with fear to😢🥺😭😪! Also after downloading this app I found out that the whole world turned into Cheeto Dust😧You should think twice before even thinking about getting this app!!! THIS IS THE WORST APP I HAVE EVER GOTTEN!!!!!!🍊👄🍊

it took DAYS to download then when i clicked on the app i started hearing loud knocks on my door. i went to check and it were TRUMP SUPPORTERS! i closed my door and proceeded to delete the app but it didn't let me!😭 now i get random notifications and phone calls ALL DAY LONG! i even tried throwing my phone off the roof of my home and it didn't work 🙄. I absolutely hate this app and the experience it has given me. i hope he considered how terrible of a app he has put out for people to use. I literally puke every time see the app on my phone 💀. it makes me go to the E.R on the daily basis!
attributes.title: THE MOST TERRIBLE APP CREATED!🤬

attributes.review: Once i 🍊opened the app📱it was glitching then my 🍊phone shut 🍊off not letting🍊 me turn it back on 😔. I cried because of what 🍊 the Trump app had done 😢 then 🍊my bird flew out 🍊the window 👣 because I accidentally left it open after taking🍊 it a walk 🐦. I hate 🍊this app 😡 delete it if you 🍊have it 🧟‍♀️ not worth your time ⏰ really terrible and useless🕴. attributes.title: Terrible!!

attributes.title: Don’t get the app it’s horrible and lags
